page.title: 14ATTITUDES
page.content: The biggest disadvantages voiced in the survey were the total lack of shopping facilities locally, bus services and a Doctors Surgery. On a general scale Nuclear war, Civil war or both were of great concern. Poverty in the World was seen as an obscenity in our world of plenty. With the have and the have-nots being driven further apart. It was felt by many that there is too much tolerance shown to the criminals and law-breakers in our society and not enough for the victims. It is feared that the world will continue on its self destructive course and that people should be educated to appreciate what they have in life and stop thinking that the world owes them a living.
